start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for AdCreatives and AdInsights APIs, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

account_id.description: The Facebook Ad account ID to use when pulling data from the Facebook Marketing API.

access_token.description: The value of the access token generated. See the docs for more information
